content.detailedDescription:
I was returning to my vehicle from shopping inside of target, in roseville.
i had just gotten in my vehicle when a light in the dark night sky caught my eye (my vehicle was facing the direction of the object).  it was extremely difficult to tell the distance of the object.  it passed between two light polls in the parking lot, but it didn't pass behind or in front of them so i couldn't gauge if the object was very small or large.  if it was small, it was perhaps the size of a basketball and above the parking lot - about 3 rows of cars away.  if it was much larger it was about 2-3 blocks away, about where hamline ave. is, or slightly farther, and larger than a house.  from my vantage point, it was above the treeline in the distance.

the object looked like is was on fire, but not a fire ball.  while i watched it before it disappeared, the flames seemed to go across the front of the object twice from left to right (in the direction it was traveling).  as soon as the flames would reach the right side, they began again on the left. the object was traveling south at slight incline of about 15 degrees.   

the thought did cross my mind that the object could be something that was burning that was flying through the air, but it seemed to be rather large for an escaped piece of burning paper or something (and it was quite cold that night, so i doubt that someone was outside having a bonfire, not to mention that there are no houses to the north of target, where this object may have originated from - if the object was indeed small).

as i watched the object, from the moment i saw it, i was trying to figure out what exactly it was.  it wasn't until it suddenly disappeared that i thought that it could have been a ufo of some sort, and i didn't have enough time to react and take a picture or video before it was gone.  this all happened within about 10 seconds before it was gone.

other people were present in the parking lot going to their cars, but i don't know if they saw the object.  it was a very cold night where people weren't lingering long to get to and from their cars.

(please excuse my crude diagram - drawn from memory.)
content.summary: Fire moved around the object

content.detailedDescription:
From my position 230 degrees sw at 45 degrees up and approximately 300 ft to a mile away.  watching the big red light using the telephone lines to see movement and found it was moving slowly ne.  i then saw about seven smaller lights moving together from the ocean side very slowly and not particularly in pattern, but moving together in coordination as in a  staggered angular format.  i ran in to get the camera and came out to find most were gone and the last few smaller lights were beginning to turn grey and blink out.  the camera shutter would not click and i could not get the damn thing to take a single picture.  i have used it all day today with no problems. the big red light was left alone and no longer moving.  i said aloud "don't go hold on!"  while i fiddled with the camera.  it then turned greyish and blink out.  i stood there for the longest time half expecting a straggler to show up.  the sky was cloudless and dark blue that night and was perfect for photography.  i need a better camera.  

1.  i went out to find a little boy making my dogs bark.  i watched him for awhile and then he walked past my side gate where i saw the red light.

2.  keeping a child from harassing my dogs.

3.  a star.

4.  it was moving ne very slowly.  used the power lines to gauge speed and motion.

5.  what is this?  can't be mars.  meteorite?  high aircraft?

6.  the lights underwent a greying effect and then were not there anymore.  i took my glasses off and rubbed my eyes in case i had red burnt into my retinas causing double vision, but i was seeing red lights.  they were not bright enough to hurt my retinas and looked like stars.  the sky last night was not black and full of stars, but dark blue with the city lights fading the night sky with light pollution.  these red lights were prominent in the sky and were not that high up.  i have seen flares before and these were not them.  i have seen balloons before as well and they don't move together in a straight path even when tied together.  not sure what i say so i have to assume that i have been witness to unidentified flying/floating objects.
content.summary: Red lights like stars with one that seemed larger than the others.

content.detailedDescription: It was more like hovering giant sharp u shaped . when i started capturing clip throught my cell phone its got stuck stopped working...
content.summary: It was more like hovering giant sharp u shaped . when i started capturing clip throught my cell phone its got stuck stopped working...

content.detailedDescription:
2-15-14 7:45am sitting in my car at my house parked car. see something in sky that has blinking red,orange,yellow lights like an airplanes blinking
lights. it looked like a bunch of valentine balloons reflecking in the
sun but they would not be blinking. thought maybe it wss an airplane
dangling a message. the one object had wing like or starlike shape
and below it circles that look like it could be dangling but not sure
they were attached. it moved slowly so i waited to see what it was and
got out my car. it was gone no where to be found. no sound claar sky and
daytime. unexplainable
content.summary: Airplane like, valentine ballon like, flashing reflective slow moving ,looked like it had somthing dangling below it with circles started coming  then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i went to whitby 28 october 2007 for the goth weekend.  i had a new olympus e330 with which i took three photos on the top of whitby cliffs (next to the abbey) to stitch together for a panorama.  christmas week that year i opened the photo on my pc full size and was astonished to see two cylinder shaped ufos just below the clouds.  there have never been any similar entities on photos and i know that they are not any form of lens flare.
when you zoom in on the photo you can see that the cylinders are lighter on top and darker underneath.
there was no sound and i did not see them when i took the photo.
content.summary: I took severaal photos to make a panorama and found these after loading it on my pc

content.detailedDescription: I have several reports dating back as far as 6 years with move on and other agencies. i have become sensitive to these objects and creatures i know when their present i have been personally attacked by them. i've had move on out and was less then happy or comfortable with the investigator assigned to appease me! well here you go mufon about a couple grey's pop the hatch and stick their disgusting little heads out and do whatever bugs do! i was so asleep woke up 2 a sensation i get when entities are present turned on my sony light gathering cctv system ambien filming as usual or every night there they were only this time for some reason they brought down there cloaking device exposing the actual ship and two occupants. these are not friendly little guys i've been attacked by them and i believe i have permanent kidney or liver damage from being shot with microwave weapons which i actually captured on hd my own attack!There's a big conspiracy and the players all know what's really going on and have no problem letting humanity work themselves until the rocks hit us well they're all comfy in their burrows. i'm only posting this report to let all of them that are involved in the cover up and crimes against humanity that there's hell to pay and before i leave this planet justice will be served on a big platter!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo's everywhere every night landings, abductions, microwave attacks and they are building up a force.

content.detailedDescription:
because of my past experience/sightings of u.F.O's i was always looking up into the night sky to observe the stars when i was drawn to the brilliant star-like ufo that i always associate with previous sightings/photographs.  this was high in the sky, in a northerly direction, but 'brilliant white'.  i was then able to capture around 15 images that night of the ufo  it was stationary, but also in the sky i noticed a further two 'star'like' ufo's in an easterly direction low in the sky (too low for them to be stars)- but they were not as glowing, or as bright as the object further in the sky, and which was the focus of my attention.  i was excited, as always, because from my past sightings/experiences and from the images captured with my digital camera, i could see that, at long last, i was able to obtain further images of the ufo, but in greater detail and purporting to be, (which i have always believed) to be a mothership of the smaller ufo crafts that i had obtained images.  the sighting lasted for three and a half hours before the 'star-like' ufo suddenly became less bright (dimmed) and then just disappeared.  i have observed in all my sightings of these 'star-like' ufo's, that this is the way they all disappear from view.
i have formed my own opinions on this, which i will be happy to share with you at a future date.

the next night the star-like ufo returned again, very bright, but this time it was not as far up in the sky and it's position was focused more at the bottom of the street where i was living.  it was around the same time of night, and again i was able to take a further 15 or so images of this craft, and to my amazement when i checked the images i found that i was able to capture this ufo craft at very close range, hovering above the rooftops of the homes at the end of the street, and during the time of taking the photographs this craft was not visible to me, which was incredible, considering the size of it, and on some photos, actually obscuring the homes at the end of the street, and the night sky obscured by all/some parts of this craft. therefore i have images of the craft at different angles. 

since i obtained these images, i have sent 6 of them to a digital forensics expert in the u.S.A. (because of their spectacular nature and taken with digital camera)to confirm the authenticity and the fact that these images are 'real' and have not been manipulated, or altered in any shape, or form.  i have his report to hand confirming this.

i am very well aware of the unique nature of my photographs and therefore would like my case to be investigated at your earliest convenience.  i have had many more sightings of this ufo craft(s) from which i have further amazing images since my initial sighting of it over lockerbie at the end of july, 2007.  i have now amassed a collection of more than 1,000 photographs over the past six years and along with my sightings/experiences i hope in the near future to be able to write about these.  meanwhile, it is my wish that these photographs (because of their spectacular nature) be brought out into the open, so to speak, so that they will help the case of ufology and hopefully go some way to changing the minds of the ufo skeptics.

i look forward to your confirmation that you have received this report and it will be investigated by the mufon (uk) office, under the directorship of mr chris munns, whom i have written to, and he has advised me to report this sighting on the official sightings report.  i am attaching a copy of my letter to him, for your information.

meanwhile, i would like to take this opportunity of thanking you for your kind assistance in this matter, and hopefully in the near future i will have the opportunity of meeting up with an investigator and to giving him or her an account of my past experiences/sightings and sight of the collection of photographs from each sighting.

i intend to file another sighting report in relation to one of my latest sightings here in scotland, and from which i have been able to capture even more amazing photographs of the same 'star-like' ufo craft. 

kind regards,

yours sincerely,


lisa marzi



copy of e-mail to mr chris munns, national director, mufon uk office.


i would like to report multiple ufo sightings and photographs, since my initial sighting of ufo's over lockerbie, scotland, at the end of july, 2007.
please note that this was the start of my 'journey' with ufo's - which has taken me over a period of six years now.  mine is not the 'normal' ufo sighting, random and with sketchy photographs.  this is why i have been reluctant to bring these into the 'open' so to speak, because i realise the uniqueness of the photographs and indeed my particular case - which still scares me - to this day.
 
i did e-mail a mufon representative in scotland but unfortunately, owing to the fact that i have had changes of employment/locations within the u.K, it was not possible to meet up with a mufon representative.  i was, and still am, reluctant to send my photographs via e-mail, preferring instead to have a face to face meeting with one of your representatives, so i can have the opportunity to show him my photograph collection, gained over the years.  the most recent, taken in january of this year, depicts the mothership once more, in the sky in fife, scotland.
 
briefly, i would add that i am on the verge of seeking publication for my photographs, and consulted a copyright lawyer some years ago, realising the uniqueness of my photographs at that time.  since then, i have been able to capture many more, close range shots of a huge mothership hovering over the roofs of homes near my home in northumberland at the time, and these, in my opinion, (a sequence of 30 plus photographs, taken over a two night period) in january, 2011.  
 
however, now i have been able to obtain some more spectacular shots in january of this year, depicting a stationary ufo craft, on a section of the mothership, along with two smaller crafts, in motion, depicting their power trail in the sky.  actually seeing is believing!    i have not sent in an office mufon report to date, along with photographs, for the reasons stated above, as it is my intention to write a book regarding my experiences, incorporating the best of my photographs. i would like to make it clear, that my photographs are not just 'blobs' in the sky which could be interpreted as something other than a ufo craft, but a mothership of immense proportions, hovering in the sky, at night.   
 
i would like you to know that i am a seasoned expatriate, having spent over 20 years of my life living and working in the middle east, mostly the kingdom of saudi arabia, where i used to frequently camp out in the desert at night, and have a wonderful view of the stars overhead.  this, (along with a culminatjion of other factors) led me to realise that the star that i was observing from my loung window in lockerbie in 2007, was not a star, and led to me taking a sequence of photographs.  afterwards i sent these photographs for analyzation to a scientist dealing with ufo photography in texas, u.S.A. who informed me that these photographs were unique, real, and in his opinion depicted two separate ufo crafts in the sky.  since then, i have also submitted another six of my photographs for forensic digital analyzation to an expert in u.S.A.,  (because of their spectacular nature i would assume that people would have doubts about their authenticity), and of course his report states that these photographs of the mothership, at close range, have not been altere or manipulated in any way.  they are real, just as they were when i took them over northumberland in 2011.  
 
now i feel that the time is right to bring these photographs to the 'world stage' so to speak, as they are so numerous now, and of immense scientific importance in the field of ufology and hopefully will lead a lot of non-believers and skeptics, to realise that there are in fact ufo's - it is just that it is so difficult even to capture one good photograph of them, let alone the 1,000 i have been able to amass.
 
i would love to have the opportunity to speak with you regarding my case, as there are many more things in connection with these sightings i need to advise you about.  could you please therefore contact me via hotmail, or to try and arrange a meeting with a representative in edinburgh region - by phoning my work number which is 0131-536-0337 (reception of royal hospital for sick children in edinburgh) - .
 
i look forward to hearing from you at your earliest convenience.
 
yours sincerely,
 
 
 
lisa marzi
 
 
ps none of my photos have been published to date, and very few people know of their existence
content.summary: Sighting of three 'star-like' ufo's in u.K. over to consecutive nights in 2011 - capturing 30 images digitally of event.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my grandfathers grave taking pictures. i was with my mother and brother. i've always been a sky watcher and have seen some things before, but this time i had my camera and was able to take a couple pictures. to be honest i forgot all about the pictures until i was deleting out old ones i have. then it all came back to me. i've been sitting on the pictures for a while because i didn't want to come off as crazy for thinking what is probably an airplane that i just don't know of, being a ufo. for what i can remember it was a partly cloudy day, very nice out. we were just going to my grandfathers grave to do some picture taking and clean off grave stones of grown over grass. something we had taken to doing. i looked up at the sky as i always am doing. fascinated with the wide open blue. and just before the cloud line i saw this object. i started to take pictures of it, only being able to grab a couple that didn't blur out completely. then it disappeared into the clouds. though in the picture the entire sky is white, it was a partly cloudy, but mostly blue sky day. it was a triangle and as it moved farther away you could see what appears to be a wall in the back of something that looked like it had very little depth. and then it changed completely.  i believe i tried to get my mother to look, but by the time she did it was gone. 

i am a believer in extra-terrestrial life.
 
in the photos i include the only thing i've done is cropped and zoomed in on it. i'm not very good with clearing up photos so if anyone could i'd appreciate it.
content.summary: Triangle in sky

content.detailedDescription: Sorry i do not have any photos or video as the objects were much too far and all i had was my cell phone. i parked my car in the street, and as i walked home on the side walk i first saw one object that at first seemed to be a star, but after observing it a few minutes i realized it had multiple lights that were changing colors and seemed to be flashing. the only reason i felt this was not a plane, helicopter, or blimp is because it was absolutely stationary, and they never moved left to right nor got closer or further away. i stopped at the best vantage point i could find and kept a few stationary objects in view next to the ufo so that i could tell if the object was moving or not. after i set my view up, i glanced around and saw that there was an identical object just north of the first one, perhaps 3 degrees higher off the horizon and farther away. i was not able to tell exactly how far the objects were or how high as i had no point of reference and i could make out no actual shape. i would guess they had 4 or more visible lights there were flashing in my view. they seemed to be slightly circular in shape but from that distance they could have been flat on the sides i could see. i watched these objects for approximately 20 minutes before i decided to go in my home and get my cell phone to try and take a picture. they objects never moved from their positions the whole time. this is my first sighting of an object(s) that i 100% believe to be a ufo. unfortunately i have no visual evidence but i am making this report in hopes that i am not the only one to make this sighting. please let me know if there were others that reported this since these objects were plainly insight of all of southern california. thank you!
content.summary: Saw 2 hovering objects with identical lighting configuration in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I had walked me girlfriend at my house at about 2:20~ after she had left i went inside then after a few minutes thought to grab something from my car before heading to bed. when i got outside i went to the car grabbed what i needed and turned to return back inside when i heard a buzz/humming sound that sounded alot like the sound a industrial transfomer emits like an electrical whine. the sound had a property similar to the drone a helicopter emits as it seemed to radiate from multiple directions thinking it was just a helicopter out of sight or some other vehicle i turned back to go inside when the sound peaked it became significantly louder and it was at this time i realised i could see an oval shape blocking out the reflected light the moon was casting on th light cloud coverage watched it as it passed over noting that as it passed over head it seemed the air got much warmer and also that my eyes and head began to ache after about 15 minutes it had moved beyond where i could/hear it and there was no other activity. the way the object moved it made me think of a balloon except for its size and the fact it paused for approximately 2-3 minutes when it first crested the roof of my house and into my sight. it emitted no light of any sort.
content.summary: Heard a low humming realized there was a shape blocking out cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't see it early on, got a phone call and went out to look.  i saw what looked mostly like a very large fireball (reminiscent of the firefalls in yosemite in the days of yore). it kept moving southward, then turned south east and descended into the horizon.  i don't know exact time but the olympic games were on the japanese skater who won gold and was skating when i came back in from outside.  sometime after 9 to 9:20 pm).  the shape was mostly round, very large, bright orange, looked like a fireball.  the fireball seemed to have motion within itself.  it kept going away from where i was standing, as it moved southeastward and descended as on a path into the horizon.  (like the sun setting, only it moved much faster than a sunset).

my feelings/reaction:  well, it's as i've been seeing now since we moved here to az in 2009.  the phoenix night sky has lots of peculiar lights that definitely are not stars, planets, comets, airplanes or weather balloons.  so -- i'm mostly curious what they are.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large fireball in sky, southward; then turned se and descended into horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from mexico to tuskegee to see a lazy friend of mine. i escaped across the border and i stole a laptop from a store and used a false email address to hide from the american police because i wasn't going back to mexico, so anyway i was driving to tuskegee when i saw these strange lights in the night sky and these lights were in the shape of a teardrop so i stop along the aside of the road to get a closer look when suddenly both my truck and wristwatch, both which i also stole as well, but anyway suddenly stopped working and then suddenly i heard some pulsating sounds coming from the ground so i went to see what it was. when i got to the source of the lights and sounds, i saw a ship in the form of a huge teardrop and then suddenly coming off the teardrop-shaped ship, i saw six blonde-haired humans that were all extremely beautiful and intelligent. from my point-of-view i saw that they're were taller than average humans and were all wearing the same white skin-tight suits, both three males and three females. suddenly they saw me and slowly came towards me so i began to ran as fast as can and kept right on running until i turned around and saw the teardrop ship suddenly hovered above the trees and then it took off into the night sky at a very fast speed. after that all my truck and wristwatch suddenly. suddenly to this day i still try to tell this tale even with a new laptop i stole and a new false address.
content.summary: The object was from another planet.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on houghton rd
saw 4 glowing orbs low in sky ahead of us
area is suburban remote with little light pollution
lights in sky appeared to be moving in a formation
arrived at our destination and got out of car to view more clearly
lights were low in sky just over treetops
and appeared to be hovering
lights would glow and disappear
appeared as though there was some atmospheric fog around them
edges were fuzzy, not defined
lights disappeared one by one
content.summary: 4 orange glowing orbs seen low in sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was on the january 23, 2014 around noon. i was cooking in the kitchen and a light was beeming from my balcony windows directly in my kitchen; it made me look outside and i noticed a shimmering object. i went out in the balcony and i was perplexed by this object because i have seen it until now alredy three times. this time the object had a big tail and i was thinking that it was ison. i took a few digital fotos. soon the sun appeared partially from behind the left side of my building, from east. i could observe with my binocular moving things around the partially appeared sun and some of those objects were very bright and changing colors and appeared like ladders to me. i took my video camera and i started filming but was so hard to look at the sun even with sun glasess, so at one point i filmed without looking at all at the sun. the sun appeared to have a dark halo and between halo and sun were a lot of movements of bell shape objects.  i was looking to the object which was shimmering like a rainbow and had a long tail which appeared to be joing another object to the west much smaller.  some of those objects coming from behind the sun in the halo seemed to me that were going in and out from the shimmering object. i made very short videos because i felt my hands were burning from that light and also was bitter cold. i could not here any distinct noise but in the video if i am not mistaken is a strange sound but i do not know because the 401 is very close as well.
i was astounded seeing for the fourth time the same object. i watched this phenomenon until the shimmering object faded away and than i stopped filming. the sun was very bright that day around noon. in my videos are many, many objects swarming in that dark corona of the sun if that was our sun. i felt that i am blessed to see such phenomenon which does not happen every day and to every one. i can forward for now just fotos and snap shots from videos.
also i have pictures of the moon and the same shape of bell objects flying close to the moon.
content.summary: One looked like sun and one like a shimering object

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were exiting an establishment in libertyville with a clear evening and a full moon. my son and wife first noticed object was initially descending then changed course ascending then disappeared from view. outside surface appeared glowing red as if on fire. it was a clear night and barely a cloud in the sky.
content.summary: Flaming object flying then disappeared while ascending

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on our balcony of our condo in baka california k35 so of rosarito beach
red /orange roundish shaped with yellow center suddenly appeared
told my wife to hurry and look up
we just sat trying to figure out what we were seeing. gave a little bit of a feeling of moving nearer than farther. bright light the whole time. then it suddenly disappeared. left no glow
still sitting here trying to future it out
my wife went on internet right after to see if it had been reported
found many websites. one with a photo of what's exactly what we sa
content.summary: Sitting on balcony.Suddenly in sky bright orange light with yellow center. hovered near small star gave impression go in out motiondidn't fade just disappeared after 1 min

content.detailedDescription: Earlier that night i had been looking at stars and pondering ufo/extraterrestrials, then a large cloud moved over the general area. i was wide awake and lying at the foot of my bed. there is a large window cracked open on the side of me and a small square window above the head of my bed, so from where i am i can see out of the square window. it was 12:40 am and i witnessed an unidentifiable object with gold and red lights glide behind said cloud. i decided to stay up ten or so minutes to see if i anything else happened. at 12:50 ish i was slightly facing my large window lying down and i heard a sound as if something was descending from the sky, similar to an airplane but much quieter and less muffled. i turned a fraction of an inch towards my square window, thinking sarcastically "what if that is a ufo," and to my surprise i saw a cross section of a ufo directly in front of me through the window. i jolted out of bed to the head of my bed and was staring directly at a ufo. it had gold and red lights in a repeating order circling it about 1/3 up the top of it. our streets have the houses facing inwards to each other so there is not much space for things to fit in between. it was a very small looking ufo, approximately 12 yards diameter, completely circular. i stared at it for about 15-30 seconds, completely horizontal from it as it was hovering, and then it tilted a bit, glided up over the houses slowly, made a right behind a few trees and was out of my vision.Mind you i was wide awake the entire time, it could not have been a dream in the slightest, only other object i felt could possibly be it is a drone, but i feel that is far more unlikely, given it's appearance and��� everything.
content.summary: Full sighting of ufo, right in front of me

content.detailedDescription: My father, brother, and i were returning from a restaurant around 9pm. we were driving down the road to my house. i noticed an aircraft. when i looked closely, i realized it was not an f18's lights, or any other usn aircraft from the area. i know the navy aircraft well by sight. it was a dark, triangular object. there was 1 or 2 lights in the center of the craft. these lights did not flash. the outline of the craft flashed every few seconds. it was flying a straight path. when i told my father ( former usn aviation  officer), the crafts lights went out right away. my father did not look up in time to see the craft. no noise was heard, we were in the car.
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufo flying 1 mile away. lights flashing, dissapeered from view after 10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Husband was putting out trash and looked up and saw two red lights about 1/2 mile apart from each other coming from the west towards him.His first thought was maybe it was mars, but they were moving so he dismissed that thought.  he yelled for me to come see and when i got outside one red light had turned north and took off and just disappeared. the second, going slower,was coming at us but also turned north and seemed to hover. then it followed the path of the first one going north at a a slower speed. we lost sight of it as it got farther away. the lights were orange/red at first and then solid red. no pulsing or blinking. the craft appeared to be round. husband is the biggest skeptic on earth, but admitted these were not airplanes or anything he could identify. i was very happy to finally witness this. i am a member of mufon.
content.summary: It was unbelievable that we were both witnessing these crafts.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting in the back yard relaxing with my six year old grandson talking to him. i just happen to look up and i spotted the rounded object floating by in the sky. at first i was kinda in shock because it was moving so slow and looked unusable. as i watch it slowly pass by, my grandson ran and  got my new sony cyber-shot digital camera. i took about 20 shots of this thing and not one photo had it in these pictures??? i watch it slowly disappear into the clouds way up there. i must have watch it for 20 minutes or so and then it was gone. this is the 2nd time i have seen this ufo about 3 months ago, it did the same thing.
content.summary: Looked like stainless steel ball.

content.detailedDescription: My mother, sister and myself were driving home north on hwy 17 leaving out of charleston sc.. as we were driving around midnight we saw a triangular like object with lights traveling north as well.. i was looking out from the right side passenger window when the object seemed to have stopped move ing and hovered in one spot for about a minute. we pulled off the side of the highway to get a better look.. at this time i have not taken my eyes off this object.. and out of no where the object disappeared.. it was a clear and cold night driving on the coast and i wanted to add that this object was very close too a cell tower as well.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object with 3 lights hovering over the treetops

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dogs i thought i saw a daytime star with my naked eye. never seen a daytime star so went and got celestial binoculars that i use to view night time stars with and started shaking when what came into view was an object just hovering in sky. i went in and got my wife and she viewed it also. it remained there for about 20 minutes and then i viewed a white circular light come on in middle of it and an orange glow around it. it then moved rather swiftly due north until i lost it. i am frequent sky watcher and avid astonmer, this was not an airplane,or meteorologic event.
content.summary: Thought it was daytime star, got celestial binoculars and realized it was a hovering object

content.detailedDescription:
The object first appeared on january 27th at approximately 6:30a.  it show very very bright in the east/southeastern sky.  we watched it until the clouds covered it and it was no longer visible.  it never moved. 

the morning of febraury 14 at approximately 6:30a, the same object.  the same location.  the same white on top, blue ring and amber bottom.  

this morning, there was some loud "animal" screaming in the national forest when i first saw it.  

we watched it until the sun came up when it was still visible and then clouds rolled in and covered it... much as they did in the first sighting.

several people have reported it in the south/southeastern skies... even on that first sighting saying it was the nova... but the nova, should not be visible as i understand it.
content.summary: The top was white, there was a blue ring in the middle and the bottom was amber colored.

content.detailedDescription: On jan.16 2014 around 4:45 pm i was on the side of my yard feeding my dogs as i normally do when i looked up at the sky there was something that just didn't look right there was this thick cloud above and to me it looked as if it was the sun but only thing it wasn't because the sun was more to the left and no clouds was over the sun.So i started yelling for my husband and i told him to look up and tell me if he sees the same thing i'm seeing now i see a bright shinning orb or sphere looking object that even had a rainbow glow around it .  i just started snapping pictures with my phone when i up loaded the pictures this is what i got.
content.summary: very bright object hovered over pearl harbor in daylight

content.detailedDescription: On or about 03nov1999, i was driving west from east 38th and shadeland ave.. as i drove over the train over-pass i noticed a bright orange light in the north-western sky. at the next street i parked in a church parking lot and observed the light motionless. it was apx 20-30 miles from my position apx 30 degrees from horizon and i could see faint red and blue lights within this orange light. it then slowly moved in a southern direction, stopped then moved northern again, stopped moved more northern, stopped and stood motionless. then slowly moved southern until out of my vision. each time it stopped it would sit for minutes (5-10) before proceeding. the episode lasted apx 30-45 minutes
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange light in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room i looked out my window i saw this huge round ballflying in sky
at first i thougjt helicopter .I got up went to the window and thougjt thats not a helicopter i just kept starring at it i was froze i just kept saying what is that.This is the fourth time ive seen ufo all different types.It flew pretty fast i watched it till it flew out if sigjt.Sorry.For mistypes my.Phone won't let me.Correct them
content.summary: Was flying med speed

content.detailedDescription: Abduction
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription:
One summer day in texas in 1980, the witness was walking through a park in houston when he noticed a 'grey triangle' moving away from him at about the height of 2x a normal wooden telephone pole.

the triangle was big; and almost invisible (similar to cellophane), and had a 'motionless billow' design that was similar to heavy smoke entirely inside its circumference. you would have had to be looking directly at it in order to see this transparent object.

as it slowly moved away further, the whole thing was slowly 'probing' from side to side (like if you took a billiard square, and moved the front tip from right to left / left to right / and repeat).

it wasn't very thick in height; and there was no sound or lights. i ran up to a guy with a camera and excitedly asked if he saw it... but when i looked up again, it was gone and he didn't see anything. i just stood there in disbelief that nobody else saw this triangle object.
content.summary: Witness observed a thin, nearly invisible triangular object 'probing from side-t-side above telephone poles.

content.detailedDescription: Hello every one. what it to share this experience to the vast  sightings of ufo al over the world. i live in fort pierce fl. and one summer day i was working in indiantown helping a friend install a clutch in a big ford dump truck that was getting ready to be put in to service. we finish the job just before night fall. we decided to drive the truck to stuart were the truck was going to be park and put in to service. while we were driving on indiantown rd toward stuart we notice a rare sighting. first we saw a hole bunch of deer al sizes more than 10. i never seen so many deers together  in my life. we almost run over one of them. a few minutes later we saw a big, huge light twice the size of our dump truck hovering over the trees. west or n west kind of following the curve road. the light was huge it was rectangular in shape kind a look like a big harmonica. it seem like it was standing still but it cud not be because we were moving in a dump truck about 40 to 45 miles per hour. we tried to decipher what this huge light was, just hovering over the trees. we have never seen nothing like it. we kept going for a few minutes and the light was just there. al of the sudden the light started to get brighter like when a rocket is just getting ready to take off . a huge expansion of light, like a bum, kind a like when you throw a rock in to a calm pond race trough the dark sky.  the object just hovered and stayed at same speed. a few minutes later it did it again. my friend and i cut not believe our eyes and we cut not figured out what the hell that light was. we were in a loud dump truck we cut not hear any noise, and y can not remember if there were other cars or not. there most a bin others cars. we were to busy looking at that huge light and trying to figure out what it was and what it was doing. a few minutes later the road curved towards the east and the huge light just keep hovering towards east n east, and eventually we lost it from our sight. today i still don't know what that huge light was.  but i m certain that it was no plane or rocket or helicopter i ever seen. hope this helps to ad another little grain of sand to the idea that we ere not along in the universe.
content.summary: Saw a huge light harmonica shape hovering over trees coming from indian town to stuart. .
